alert.note: Alert for Eastern Albany; Eastern Rensselaer; Eastern Schenectady; Northern Saratoga; Northern Washington; Southeast Warren; Southern Saratoga; Southern Washington; Western Albany; Western Greene; Western Rensselaer; Western Schenectady; Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 10 at 3:15PM EST until March 13 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...The Capital District, Lake George Saratoga Region, northern and central Taconics, eastern Catskills, and Helderbergs in east central New York and the northern Berkshires in western Massachusetts. * WHEN...From late Friday night through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates could exceed an inch per hour late Saturday morning into the afternoon. Blowing and drifting snow could reduce visibility Saturday afternoon into Saturday night.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
